Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers

Class BoardController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers.GUIController
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers.BoardController
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeListener, EventListener, javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class BoardController extends GUIController implements PropertyChangeListener
BoardController class represents the Board scene logic.
